DOC.brief_summary: The purpose present study describe acceptability gastrointestinal tolerance `` High-sn-2 '' infant formula non-breast fed healthy term infant Middle East parent-reported outcome measure pediatrician report outcome .
DOC.brief_title: Acceptability Gastrointestinal Tolerance High-Sn-2 Infant Formula
DOC.detailed_description: An open-label observational trial convenience sample one hundred formula-fed infant recruit network general pediatrician Middle Eastern country UAE , Kuwait , Qatar . Eligible infant consume high SN-2 formula 12 week . All enrol infant evaluate enrollment 4 week 2 week .
DOC.criteria: Health full term infant formula feed Partially breast formula fed infant drink least 2 formula feeding per day ; least 30 ml Age time enrollment : 2 week age 4 month age Preterm IUGR baby Contraindication standard infant formula Cow 's milk protein allergy Serious medical surgical GI disease Multiple congenital anomaly Parents refusal participate study Exclusive Breast fed baby
